short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track the time spent on each tab and reorder tabs based on usage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your browsing efficiency with Tab Time Tracker, the ultimate solution for managing the chaos of multiple open tabs. Ideal for those who find themselves lost in a sea of tabs, our extension offers a smart, seamless way to declutter and optimize your browser workspace.

Key Features:

Duplicate Tab Detection: Quickly identify and eliminate duplicate tabs to reduce clutter.

Time-Sorted Tabs: Prioritize your workflow by organizing tabs based on your time spent on each.

Tab Time Tracker is more than just a toolâ€”it's your partner in enhancing productivity and bringing order to your digital workspace. Try it now and transform your tab chaos into a model of efficiency!
